attributes.action: Prevent the extradition of Gary McKinnon to the USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gary McKinnon is facing extradition to the United States of America where he is accused of hacking into government computers. McKinnon has been diagnosed with Asperger's syndrome and faces a possible sentence of up to 70 years.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
